pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple yet Flexible Letters via the 'KOMA-Script LaTeX Bundle' // An R Markdown template for writing beautiful yet versatile letters, using the 'KOMA-Script' letter class 'scrlttr2' and an adaptation of the 'pandoc-letter' template. 'scrlttr2' provides layouts for many different window envelope types and the possibility to define your own.
